name: Naruhodo! The World
overview: An adaptation of a game show of the same title broadcast on Fuji TV between 1981-1996. The goal is to pair up into four teams and compete with each other by answering questions about locations all over the world. The teams are sorted by rank after an initial quiz round and the lowest ranking pair is offered questions first, which are then passed up the chain. The TV show featured Kinya Aikawa and Eriko Kusuda as hosts, and both are featured on the cover of this game. It was released exclusively in Japan for the Super Famicom.
